title: ‘It was by design’: Black residents try to come to terms with horror of shooting
content:
1. ‘It was by design’: Black residents try to come to terms with horror of shooting  The Guardian US
  2. Police release names of victims killed in Buffalo mass shooting, including 'hero' guard Aaron Salter  6abc Philadelphia
  3. Mass shooting at Buffalo supermarket was a racist hate crime, police say  CNN
  4. Payton Gendron wore hazmat suit to school, was hospitalized after threatening classmates  New York Post
  5. The extreme-right theory helped trigger the Buffalo NY tragedy  NorthJersey.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
